home.floating_desc: Your body is wise and tells you what it needs. We promote vitality through natural medicine, urine therapy, and bioenergetic movement. Without dependencies, awakening your inner healer.
home.pillar_1_desc: Urine therapy moves, shakes, and strengthens the immune system. A treasure of antibodies for your own healing.
home.pillar_2_desc: Bioenergetic exercises and walks to reactivate your mitochondria and raise your body temperature and will to live.
home.pillar_3_desc: Break the dependency. Learn to manage your own health away from commercial medicine that only treats symptoms.
home.quote: There is no disease in a healthy body. Your body is wise and tells you what it needs.
home.cta_title: Start your path to a full life
home.cta_desc: In-person workshops, family lodging in Anolaima, and self-management therapies. Join our community and reclaim your power.

about.bio_subtitle: Founder of the Latin American Biohealth Movement
about.bio_p1: Born in Manchuria in 1944, Oriental Master Atom Inoe has dedicated his life to the pursuit of holistic health. Graduated from the Tokyo School of Oriental Medicine.
about.bio_p2: His path marked a milestone in Nicaragua, founding the 'Natural Hospital'. In 1990, together with Dr. Uriu, the concept of Biohealth was born.
about.bio_p3: He currently resides in Anolaima, Colombia, practicing organic farming alongside his wife, Dr. Alicia Cabrera.
about.interview_desc: Get to know Dr. Atom's thoughts and philosophy first-hand in this deep conversation about life and healing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We are here to guide you
